description-who-we-are: Green Line Logistics is more than a carrier  we're a team of dedicated professionals passionate about delivering excellence in every mile we cover.With years of industry experience, we ve honed our expertise to offer a comprehensive range of logistics solutions tailored to meet the unique needs of our clients.
description-our-mission: Driven by a mission to redefine logistics, our goal is to provide efficient, sustainable, and cost-effective transportation services. We strive to be a catalyst for your success by ensuring your goods reach their destination safely, on time, and in the most environmentally friendly manner possible.
services-descriptions: With years of industry experience, we've honed our expertise to offer a comprehensive range of logistics solutions tailored to meet the unique needs of our clients.
our-solution-descriptions: With years of industry experience, we've honed our expertise to offer a comprehensive range of logistics solutions tailored to meet the unique needs of our clients.
recruitment-descriptions: Join our team and become part of a group dedicated to delivering exceptional value and care to our clients.
contact-us-descriptions: Our representatives will get in touch with you soon!
name: Name
name-erorr: First and Last Name are required.
dashboard-short-desc: NR Greenlines Logistics Co., Ltd is a company specializing in providing freight transport services, specialized goods, and container transport by two-way North-South railway.
dashboard-long-desc: Established in January 2008, the company has gained the trust of major clients such as: Toyota, Honda, Yamaha, Toro, Mitsubishi, Toshiba, Isuzu... In addition to its headquarters in Hanoi, the company currently has branch stations in Vinh Phuc, Da Nang, Binh Duong...
totals-note: This is a provisional amount, please contact us for a detailed quotation.
totals-loose-note: * Only applicable for orders from 1000kg or 3m3.
totals-distance-warning: Please contact us as the distance to the nearest station is over 20km.
